New page man. My bad. And about that. I can't in all honesty say you'll be fine or anything. Feelings like that are hard to shake. But I can say this. You're stronger than you think are. And around here, you do matter.

topics.body:
"Life is cruel because you make it so."

This is one of the phrases that I follow in life. So I feel the need to respect everyone, no matter how shitty they can be. Of course, I'm only human so that doesn't always apply.

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5592b2be63687207ca002196#post_5592b2be63687207ca002196
I'm not the best with words. But I know how you feel man. I've had times where I legit have the same terrible feelings. we have to remember to just keep kicking that engine back onto the goal we have set for ourselves. 

Also Don't let people pressure you. You should take your time with the things you want to do. Do them when you feel the most ready.

You are a great friend man. And I hope you feel better. If you need to you should take a break for a while. To Relax and all.
